Guidelines 3.3 and 3.4

Lead Independent Director

Given that our Chairman is Independent and nowexecutive, the Board does not consider it necessaryto appoint a Lead Independent Director. The Independent Directors, including the Non-Executive Chairman, and the Executive Directors individually and collectively are available as channels of communication between shareholders and the Board or Management. Thus far, there has been no situation where these channels of communication have been shown to be inadequate.
